Genre: Casual , RPG , Strategy
Developer: Striped Panda Studios
Publisher: Striped Panda Studios
Release Date: Aug 30, 2024




About This Game

The Manager

The Manager is the office's ultimate authority figure, tasked with ensuring productivity and firing the Slackers hiding among the Specialists.

Slackers

The Slacker's goal is to goof off without getting caught. Whether it’s playing Minesweeper, or taking a dump, Slackers must blend in to avoid the Manager’s wrath.

Specialists

Specialists are the backbone of the company, assigned various tasks that keep the office running smoothly. But even the hardest workers know that productivity sometimes requires a coffee break.

Gameplay Mechanics

  • Objective-Based Gameplay: Specialists are tasked with completing objectives to contribute to the company's success, whereas Slackers engage in activities to appear busy while avoiding actual work.
  • Social Deduction and Strategy: Players utilize proximity voice chat for real-time discussions, alliances, and accusations, making social interactions crucial to gameplay.
  • Managerial Oversight: The Manager must observe, deduce, and decide who to fire, with each choice potentially altering the game's balance.

item.title: Megaloot
item.description:
Title: Megaloot
Genre: Casual , Indie , RPG , Strategy
Developer: axilirate
Publisher: Ravenage Games , INSTINCT3
Franchise: Ravenage
Release Date: Aug 30, 2024




About This Game



There is a mysterious tower in this world that replicates all sorts of objects from other realities, creating an indefinite space full to the brim with monsters, strange creatures, people, and loot. You have found yourself in this reality, and now it’s your path.



Entering the tower, you find yourself in fierce battles that require valuable loot items - armor, magic rings, weapons, and much more. These are essential tools for developing your unique builds while clearing the tower's floors.

Defeat enemies and earn gold, which can be spent on new loot items. Continuously manage your loot to become stronger right in the battle by absorbing the mythical power of the items you discard - even if for a mere moment, but with dedication it’s enough to ascend to near godhood and kill whatever twisted creature stands in your way.

Loot in Megaloot serves dual purposes: it can be equipped to enhance the player’s character or consumed during battle for immediate stat boosts. After clearing each floor, you have the option to dismantle loot for permanent stat gains, adding layers of strategic depth to the gameplay.



Combine loot strategically to craft dominating builds and become the ultimate power hunter. Balance between strengths and weaknesses to maximize your power to the fullest extent.



Key features:

  • 150+ unique loot items with many variations of characteristics that have a synergistic effect to create unique builds
  • 27+ stats like Toxicity, Strength, Wisdom, Faith, Recovery, and more, which can be combined with loot and keystones for a unique strategy and tactics
  • 10 characters with their abilities
  • Simple, addictive, and challenging gameplay
  • High replayability at any time

item.title: Yarimono
item.description:
Title: Yarimono
Genre: Adventure , Indie , RPG
Developer: にゅう工房
Publisher: 072 Project
Franchise: 072 Project
Release Date: Aug 30, 2024




About This Game




Over 150 unique monsters! A massive RPG with an abundance of rich content.
Train your monster with the goal of becoming the champion!

Only the main character's partner possesses the cheat move called "Cheat Tackle".
It ensures a guaranteed first strike and a one-hit kill.
In the easy mode, you can even use it endlessly!





In this world, there exists mystical creatures known as "Yarimon".
Known as the loner protagonist with the weakest Yarimon... until now, that is.

In a surprising turn of events, the protagonist's Yarimon partner learned a godly-powerful move with a power level of 800,000 called the "Cheat Tackle".
With this, the protagonist's world completely changed, as this move will one-shot any opponent in battle (though it is only usable once per battle).

Of course, it would be foolish to believe that one can become the champion with just a single move. Therefore, a trainer must continue to hone their skills and diversify their strategies.
With that said, defeating my childhood friend for the first time is already a crazy accomplishment.
I can finally get back some of the money I lost to her...

Afterwards, I set out on an adventure after my childhood friend told me she was going on a journey and pressured me to do the same.



As I am adventuring, I slowly unravel the secret of this world.
This is when I felt like my journey had really begun.

Aim to complete the Yarimon Encyclopedia (Yaridex)!!





Monster-taming RPG
Collect a variety of Yarimon and strive relentlessly towards the championship!

Gain EXP by battling either wild Yarimon or trainers.
With the advent of EXP shards, you will also be able to freely allocate EXP to your favorite Yarimon!

Uncover the truth and secrets that are hidden within this world!

Explore the secrets hidden in this world, gradually unveiling it's truth!

  • Over 150 monsters
  • Pixel art for each character
  • Illustrations for each character along with various facial expressions
  • Having a monster index

item.title: Visions of Mana
item.description:
Title: Visions of Mana
Genre: Action , RPG
Developer: Square Enix
Publisher: Square Enix
Franchise: Mana Series
Release Date: Aug 29, 2024




About This Game

Visions of Mana is a brand new title in this series revolving around the sacred sword and mana.
The protagonist Val and his childhood friend Hinna, the newly appointed Alm of Fire, set off on a journey to the Mana Tree.

This game’s iconic vibrant and vast semi-open field contains adorable yet ferocious monsters, allowing you to enjoy swift three-dimensional battles using the power of the Elementals.
Through adventures with friends met along the way, they start to see the truth about the world.
Must we accept our fates?

A new “Mana” tale begins here as a classic fantasy series returns to its roots.



▸Bold graphics full of characteristic “Mana” flair
The characters journey across a vibrant world alive with spirits.



▸Exploring the world
Explore the vast, semi-open world that stretches as far as the eye can see. Traverse the environment quickly and safely with new companions, the “Pikuls".



▸Harness the power of the Elementals
In this game, you will fight enemies using weapons that house the power of the Elementals. Change between different classes and characters to suit your playstyle and enjoy combat that has evolved both three-dimensionally and strategically.

▸ Breathtaking and immersive soundtrack
Around 100 background music tracks by a talented team of creators who have worked on countless tracks throughout the series. The music in field areas feature interactive music, heightening the mood for adventure.
